name: The Eclipse
description:
WASD to move
E to interact with building locations to open up the build menu. Click to select what you want to build.
Place resource gatherers, processors and bot spawners to make bots to sell to the factions. Flip the levers on the back of the bot spawners to pick which side they’re going to. Earn money and make a lot of bots.

You and your brother need to buy tickets to the Chronos, the last shuttle off planet. The only way to get that kind of money is to work for Hephaestus Labs. Each ticket costs 1500 credits and the only way to make money here is to sell bots! There are two corporations that you can sell to and it's your job to sell to both of them so that neither side wins. Keep going until you earn 3000 credits and can buy your way off this planet.

Made for Ludum Dare 50 as a prequel to Expansion Core: https://candlebird.itch.io/expansion-core
